# हिन्दी (Hindi) Test Document

## CC BY 4.0 License Translation (Hindi)

यह दस्तावेज़ ERDA CC-BY CJK Font में Devanagari (Hindi) वर्णों के लिए परीक्षण डेटासेट है।

### Essential Characters Tested

This document tests the following essential Devanagari characters:

- **Consonants**: य (ya), न (na), द (da), ह (ha)
- **Vowel Signs**: ि (vowel sign i), ी (vowel sign ii)
- **Diacritics**: ं (anusvara), ् (virama/halant)

### Sample Text

हिन्दी

## Character Coverage Test

All critical characters from the warnings:

1. ह (U+0939) - ha
2. ि (U+093F) - vowel sign i
3. न (U+0928) - na
4. ् (U+094D) - virama
5. द (U+0926) - da
6. ी (U+0940) - vowel sign ii
7. य (U+092F) - ya
8. ं (U+0902) - anusvara
